quote: Do the thing and you will have the power.
Create more, consume less.
Move towards resistance and pain.
To know what you want to draw, you must begin to draw.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: Speed of iteration always beats quality of iteration.
author: John Boyd

quote: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: The ones who put themselves in the line as a way of life learn much faster than the ones that are protecting their egos.
author: Josh Waitzkin

quote: When in doubt, iterate faster.
author: Jeff Atwood

quote: Have a bias toward action - let's see something happen now. You can break that big plan into small steps and take the first step right away.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: Do what matters the whole time and then stop.
author: Jack Conte

quote: You can't choose what you are famous for.
author: Jack Conte

quote: Real artists ship.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Whether you’re doing a bicep curl in a chilly gym or talking to world leaders, there are no shortcuts — everything is reps, reps, reps… No matter what you do in life, its either reps or mileage.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
cite: Total Recall: My Unbelievably True Life Story (2012)

quote: What you practice grows stronger.
author: Shauna Shapiro

quote: Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Addiction to distraction is the death of creative production.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Don't mistake movement for achievement. It's easy to get faked out by being busy. The question is: Busy doing what?
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The best way to get that next position is to do an amazing job where you are.
author: Sherri Coale

quote: We don't rise to the level of our expectations; we fall to the level of our training.
author: Archilochus

quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process is its own reward.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Progress is not linear.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. Twenty-six times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: The days are long but the decades are short
author: Sam Altman
